msbt.message: I catch fish like these sometimes, but they seem way fancier when you see them in here!
This is designed to be kind of like the fish's natural habitat, right? So where's their furniture?
Looking at these fish It makes me a little hungry.
Whenever I'm feeling kind of tired or down, I come here to take a break. It's just so relaxing here, you know?

I want to get the relaxing vibe of this place in my house. What would I need for the trendiest aquarium? HmmI've got to buy a big fish tankmood lightinga castle a bubbly treasure chest and some fish, I guess!
Hot tip for you, ! Lighting like this is perf for dates!Imagine being here with somebody who you think is totes special and you're SURROUNDED by fish!
Whenever I'm here, I feel like I'm in the ocean. Totes like I'm a mermaid, dancing beneath the waves!
This place is so relaxing. Do you think that's because it's kind of dark? Or is it the fish?
The mood lighting, the fish swimming around, the promise of underwater adventuresHere I get all the perks of being a mermaid, but I don't have to worry about my skin getting wrinkly!
Does your island have a fish exhibit too, ? Do you have any fish that aren't here?
What do you think of our museum? I'm a big fan of our fish exhibit. It's tr√®s aquatique!
Each fish here has their own super fab fish fash. Know what you call a fish fashionista? A "fish-onista"!I have to write this stuff down. I'm so funny, I could be my own opening act!
Heeey! Are you here to see the museum too, ?It's so magical with all the fish and glimmering water. I want to dress up like a mermaid and get in there!
I'm loving this totally photogenic fish tank! It's perf for a selfie sesh, but Blathers says no flash photos!
The big fish tank's soft light is so romantic This is def going to be a popular date spot, .
